alert.note: Alert for Sheridan County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 02 at 12:42PM MDT until September 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS: Very low humidities, near record high temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: In North Central WY Fire Zone...274. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In North Central WY...Sheridan. * WIND: South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES: 95 to 100.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
